name: AccessibilityActionKind
desc: The structure that defines the kinds of available accessibility actions.

items.name: static func == (AccessibilityActionKind, AccessibilityActionKind) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

items.name: static let `default`: AccessibilityActionKind
items.desc: The value that represents the default accessibility action.

items.name: static let escape: AccessibilityActionKind
items.desc: The value that represents an action that cancels a pending accessibility action.
